org.netbeans.api.search

Class SearchScopeOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.netbeans.api.search.SearchScopeOptions

  • public class SearchScopeOptions
extends Object
    This class holds user options and custom filters. It is used to specify which files should be iterated by SearchInfo.
    It can be initialized with values specified in UI component ScopeOptionsController

      • create

        @NonNull
public static SearchScopeOptions create(@NullAllowed
                                                 String pattern,
                                                 boolean regexp)
        Parameters:
        pattern - File name pattern.
        regexp - Regular expression mode.
        Returns:
        Instance initialized with passed file-name related options.

      • create

        @NonNull
public static SearchScopeOptions create(@NullAllowed
                                                 String pattern,
                                                 boolean regexp,
                                                 boolean searchInArchives,
                                                 boolean searchInGenerated,
                                                 @NullAllowed
                                                 List<SearchFilterDefinition> filters)
        Parameters:
        pattern - File name pattern.
        regexp - File name pattern specified as regular expression.
        searchInArchives - Enable searching in archives.
        searchInGenerated - Enable searching in generated sources.
        filters - List of file object filters. Can be null.
        Returns:
        Instance initialized with passed options;
